content.body: Is it useful for me to come?

given it seems there's space in the agenda, it might be potentially interesting to discuss https://github.com/tc39/tg5/issues/4 . it's quite a long thread but i have a feeling a couple of concrete research problems could be extracted already. that leaves open where to publish, who will work on it etc. technically i can do some chunk of the writing as long as there's a framework within which to operate
